verses.text: And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which have \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 20.2 \ft bondage: Heb. servants\f*
Thou shalt have no \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* before \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee any graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, or any \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w* \add of any thing\add* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \add is\add* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, or that \add is\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath, or that \add is\add* in the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* under the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

Thou shalt not bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* thyself to them, nor \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add am\add* a \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* unto the \w third|strong="H8029"\w* and \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \add generation\add* of them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me;

And \w shewing|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* me, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will not hold him \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w* that \w taketh|strong="H5375"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*.
\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to keep it \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.
\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w labour|strong="H5647"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all thy \w work|strong="H4399"\w*:

But the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add in it\add* thou shalt not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* any \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, thou, nor thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, nor thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, thy \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, nor thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, nor thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, nor thy \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:

For \add in\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and all that in them \add is\add*, and \w rested|strong="H5117"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: wherefore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* it.

¶ \w Honour|strong="H3513"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: that thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* may be \w long|strong="H0748"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee.
Thou shalt not \w kill|strong="H7523"\w*.
Thou shalt not commit \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.
Thou shalt not \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*.
Thou shalt not \w bear|strong="H6030"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, thou shalt not \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, nor his \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, nor his \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, nor his \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, nor his \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, nor any thing that \add is\add* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w*.

¶ And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w thunderings|strong="H6963"\w*, and the \w lightnings|strong="H3940"\w*, and the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w smoking|strong="H6226"\w*: and when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, they \w removed|strong="H5128"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou with us, and we will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: but let not \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with us, lest we \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H5668"\w* \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* you, and that his \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* may be before your \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, that ye \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* not.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* drew \w near|strong="H5066"\w* unto the thick \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* where \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Thus thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* that I have \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with you from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

Ye shall not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* with me \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, neither shall ye \w make|strong="H6213"\w* unto you \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

¶ An \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* unto me, and shalt \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* thereon thy burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and thy peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and thine \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*: in all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* where I \w record|strong="H2142"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* I will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, and I will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee.

And if thou wilt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* me an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, thou shalt not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* it of hewn \w stone|strong="H1496"\w*: for if thou lift \w up|strong="H5130"\w* thy \w tool|strong="H2719"\w* upon it, thou hast \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* it.\f + \fr 20.25 \ft build…: Heb. build them with hewing\f*

Neither shalt thou go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* unto mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, that thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* be not \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* thereon.
